as this way of decreasing should be used throughout the pattern decrease insert hook in front loop only of first st insert hook in front loop only of second st 3 lps on hook yo and draw through 2 lps yo and complete single_crochet as normal please see this youtube video for a demonstration of this type of decrease useful from 1min 48 in ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ pattern start arm make 2 crocheted in continuous spirals without joining the rounds from hand to shoulder use a stitch marker to keep track of where the beginning of each round starts round 1 magic_ring ch1 not a st work 8hdc 8sts rnds 2 & 3 single_crochet into each st around 8sts round 4 single_crochet in each of the first 2sts decrease single_crochet into each of the next 2sts decrease 6sts rnds 5 - 11 single_crochet into each st around 6sts no need to stuff round 12 now holding the arm so that the working loop on the hook is on the right pinch the top of the arm together you will have 3sts on either side ch1 not a st and single_crochet in each st across working through all 4 loops at the front and back of the work to close the top of the arm 3sts fasten_off and hide loose ends you will crochet the arms onto the body on round 26 of the body foot and leg make 2 crocheted in continuous spirals without joining the rounds from the foot upwards use a stitch marker to keep track of where the beginning of each round starts round 1 magic_ring ch1 not a st work 8hdc 8sts round 2 work 2sc into each st around 16sts round 3 single_crochet into the back loop of each st around 16sts round 4 single_crochet into each st around 16sts round 5 single_crochet into each of the first 4sts decrease x4 single_crochet into each of the remaining 4sts 12sts round 6 single_crochet into each
